content: i installed to zulip server in locally ., i configure redmine ingratiation plugin in redmine , but i changed in project its look like ...internal server error ., pls help to resolve this

zulip_redmine_plugin_error.png

i'm using bitnami redmine --- how to reslove this error
@boopathi moved this thread to its own topic.
The issue is pretty clearly SSL verification. I recommend making sure your Zulip server has a real SSL certificate.

The issue is pretty clearly SSL verification. I recommend making sure your Zulip server has a real SSL certificate.

i used this command .,
./zulip-server-*/scripts/setup/install --self-signed-cert –email=YOUR_EMAIL –hostname=YOUR_HOSTNAME

how to find ssl certificate in zulip folder and how to change it
its supported to redmine 3.6 version, but version 4.0.1 have some error to install how to install
@boopathi can you provide the details on the error?

i resolved this error by changing "ActiveRecord::Migration[5.0]"

NameError.png

after configure plugin i have this error

This part looks like an issue with setting up Redmine, nothing to do with Zulip.
Mysql2::Error::ConnectionError: Can't connect to local MySQL server through socket '/env/redmine-4.0.1-

This issue seems like something we might be able to investigate.

NameError.png

after configure plugin i have this error

Can you open an issue here: https://github.com/zulip/zulip-redmine-plugin/issues with those details, what version of Redmine you're using, etc.? The maintainer of that plugin doesn't hang out on chat.zulip.org.
